name: TFVCGet
description: Gets a file or a folder tree from TFVC source control
author: Seva Alekseyev

inputs.name: TFVCPath
inputs.label: Source control path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute TFVC path of the file or folder to get, starting with $/. Folders will be downloaded recursively.

inputs.name: LocalPath
inputs.label: Target path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to store the TFVC item(s). If downloading a file, it can be a file name or an existing folder name. If getting a folder and the path doesn't exist, it will be created.

inputs.name: Timeout
inputs.label: Timeout:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection timeout, in seconds, for the Azure DevOps REST API client. Blank means the API default; as of the time of this writing, it was 180 seconds.
